title: Redmi Note 11 Pro Plus 5G Unboxing: What’s in the box?
content:
Xiaomi has an extensive portfolio in key Asian markets like India, China, Indonesia, and beyond. Thanks to its insane value, the Redmi Note series is one of the most popular mobile lineups globally. For 2022, Xiaomi has a full refresh for its Redmi Note lineup, with devices like the Redmi Note 11 Pro Plus 5G

The post Redmi Note 11 Pro Plus 5G Unboxing: What’s in the box? appeared first on xda-developers.
description: The Redmi Note 11 Pro Plus 5G is a well-rounded mid-ranger from Xiaomi that will suit most average users. This is what you get inside its box!
